mapper.insert: INSERT INTO advert (publicationDate, district, address, floor, maxFloor, rooms, sq, price, withPublicServices, conditions, description, trustRate, raw) VALUES (#{publicationDate}, #{district}, #{address}, #{floor}, #{maxFloor}, #{rooms}, #{sq}, #{price}, #{withPublicServices}, #{conditions}, #{description}, #{trustRate}, #{raw})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM advert WHERE #{timestamp} > publicationDate AND raw = FALSE ORDER BY publicationDate DESC limit #{limit}
SELECT min(price) as priceMin, max(price) as priceMax FROM advert WHERE raw = FALSE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO advert_author (isMain, advertId, userId) VALUES (FALSE, #{advertId}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM advert WHERE raw = TRUE ORDER BY publicationDate DESC limit 1000
